instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Imac 27 screen backlight is gone.
threads.message:
I had several iMac 27 and all of them with backlight problems. I replaced screens there. I found this video. Is that the solution for them?

[URL]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gSzmyqQFZ2M[/URL]

Min 7-8

threads.title: Imac 27 screen backlight is gone.
threads.message: I already posted the solution many times here about reflowing the LEDs and resoldering the connectors on the LED strips.
